name: Coralium
description:
Coralium es un pez mágico que tiene habilidades para limpiar y plantar corales. Salva al arrecife de depredadores y de la contaminación humana.

Completa esta encuesta al terminar de jugar: https://forms.gle/EbEJukMKqDH3XuEC6

Coralium is a magical fish capable of cleaning and planting corals. Save the coral reef from predators and human pollution.

Game UI is set in Spanish for this phase of development, we promise there will be an English version in the future. In spite of that, we still created a form in English for English-speaking users, please fill it when you're done playing: https://forms.gle/SmEPw6AheuWFDuR78
